com.ditlabavailability.helpers

Class FilterPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.ditlabavailability.helpers.FilterPreferences

  • public class FilterPreferences
extends Activity
    Helper class for the shared preferences for the filter settings.
    Author:
    Alan Haverty

      FilterPreferences(Context mContext)
      Creates new filter preference file and editor.

    • Method Detail

      • isAllFiltersEnabled

        public boolean isAllFiltersEnabled()
        Returns:

        True

        if KEY_ALL_FILTERS_ENABLED exists in the preference file with a value of True,

        False

        if the value is False or if KEY_ALL_FILTERS_ENABLED doesn't exist in the file

      • setAllFiltersEnabled

        public void setAllFiltersEnabled(boolean allFiltersEnabled)

      • isFavouritesEnabled

        public boolean isFavouritesEnabled()
        Returns:

        True

        if KEY_FAVOURITES_ENABLED exists in the preference file with a value of True,

        False

        if the value is False or if KEY_FAVOURITES_ENABLED doesn't exist in the file

      • setFavouritesEnabled

        public void setFavouritesEnabled(boolean favouritesEnabled)

      • getDemoTimeHour

        public int getDemoTimeHour()
        Used only for demo purposes while changing the 'current time' through the filter intent
        Returns:
        The integer value of KEY_DEMO_TIME_HOUR if it exists in the preference file, If the value does not exist, integer 11 will be returned.

      • setDemoTimeHour

        public void setDemoTimeHour(int demoTimeHour)

      • getDemoTimeMinute

        public int getDemoTimeMinute()
        Used only for demo purposes while changing the 'current time' through the filter intent
        Returns:
        The integer value of KEY_DEMO_TIME_MINUTE if it exists in the preference file, If the value does not exist, integer 5 will be returned.

      • setDemoTimeMinute

        public void setDemoTimeMinute(int demoTimeMinute)

      • setAllPreferences

                     int demoTimeMinute)
